hero.title: Hey! I'm Sasha
hero.subtitle: Front-end Web Dev
hero.text: I'm a passionate React developer with a keen eye for crafting beautiful, intuitive, and responsive user interfaces. My focus is on delivering clean, maintainable code that ensures seamless functionality and a great user experience. Whether it's building from scratch or enhancing existing projects, I strive to deliver solutions that meet user and business needs.

about.title: About me
about.text: I enjoy creating visually appealing things, I focus on problem solving, I have solid communication and presentation skills, I value dedication

foreword.title: Let me start with...
foreword.text: I've started tinkering with HTML/CSS at the end of 2015...

afterword.title: Next up...
afterword.text: It's a pleasure and a privilege to work with people who are passionate about their work and enjoy figuring things out. I'm always open for a team where collaboration and creativity lead the way.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.text: I'd love to hear from you! Whether you're looking to collaborate on a project, need a dedicated developer for your team, or just want to discuss ideas, feel free to reach out.
